name: Lydia's Labyrinth
storyline:
Welcome to my labyrinth darling! Do please try not to die too quickly, will you?

It is so wonderful to have your fate nestled in the palm of my hands.

I do so hope that you will enjoy my little game. My marvelous maze is filled to the brim with delightfully deadly tricks and traps.

However, should you prove yourself worthy and find me at the end of the labyrinth, it would be my deepest pleasure to bestow upon you, your final reward!

Don't keep me waiting my lovely
summary:
Lydia's Labyrinth is a "choose your own adventure" style visual novel, inspired by the classic old school game books such as the 'Fighting Fantasy' series.

Embark upon an odyssey through the Vampress' lair, seeking freedom, fortune, love, vengeance or even clues to your own origins!
